title: Introduction to Tailwind CSS
courseDescription: This course introduces you to Tailwind CSS, a utility-first framework for rapid and consistent UI development. It covers essential concepts and prepares you for practical implementation.

content.context: Tailwind CSS is a utility-first CSS framework designed to simplify UI development by providing pre-defined classes that allow you to build responsive and consistent designs without writing custom CSS.
Tailwind CSS enables faster development and ensures design consistency by using utility classes. It provides flexibility and eliminates the need to manage custom CSS files.
Step-by-step guide to setting up Tailwind CSS using npm or CDN. Understand how to integrate it with your project and verify that the setup is working.
Learn about the utility-first approach and how it differs from traditional CSS frameworks. Discover how Tailwind's utilities can be combined to create custom designs efficiently.
Explore the key features of Tailwind CSS, including responsive design utilities, customizable themes, and a large collection of pre-defined classes for layout, spacing, and typography.
